lines.text: Now get me a knife, dick cheese... We got some skinnin' to do.
That might fly in California. But not Ohio. Ridgeway, Ohio at that. This is about as backwoods as it gets. Except maybe for Akron.
Are there any motels in this rat-hole of a town?
There was the Bates place, out by the old highway. That closed down years ago. Other than that, you're out of luck.
